dcterms:description: A large dataset containing CT scans from subjects with COPD, ranging from mild to very severe, used for training and evaluating lobe segmentation models.

dcterms:description: A dataset of chest CT scans from COVID-19 patients, used to analyze CT findings and their relationship to the duration of infection.
dcterms:title: COVID-19 CT Scans
